name: opc-ua-tracer
description: Electron + React (Vite) OPC UA tracer with simulation mode

scripts.dev: cross-env VITE_MODE=dev ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:5173 concurrently -k "vite" "tsup src/preload/index.ts --format cjs --out-dir dist/preload --external electron --watch" "tsup src/main/index.ts --format esm --out-dir dist/main --external electron --watch" "wait-on tcp:5173 && electron ."
scripts.dev:simulation: cross-env SIMULATION=true VITE_MODE=dev ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:5173 concurrently -k "vite" "tsup src/preload/index.ts --format cjs --out-dir dist/preload --external electron --watch" "tsup src/main/index.ts --format esm --out-dir dist/main --external electron --watch" "wait-on tcp:5173 && electron ."
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:preload && npm run build:main && electron-builder -w dir --publish=never
scripts.zip:portable: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if (Test-Path 'release/win-unpacked') { Compress-Archive -Path 'release/win-unpacked/*' -DestinationPath 'release/opcua-tracer-portable.zip' -Force } else { Write-Error 'win-unpacked not found. Run npm run deploy first.' }"
